files.content:
import {
  TestimonialCard,
  TestimonialHeader,
  TestimonialAvatar,
  TestimonialInfo,
  Name,
  Username,
  TestimonialStars,
  TestimonialContent,
  TestimonialHighlight,
  TestimonialDate,
  TestimonialCarousel,
} from "@/registry/default/ui/testimonial"

export default function TestimonialDemo() {
  return (
    <TestimonialCarousel>
      <TestimonialCard>
        <TestimonialHeader>
          <TestimonialAvatar src="/faces/1.jpg" alt="John Doe" />
          <TestimonialInfo>
            <Name>John Doe</Name>
            <Username>@johndoe</Username>
          </TestimonialInfo>
        </TestimonialHeader>
        <TestimonialStars />
        <TestimonialContent>
          This product is <TestimonialHighlight>amazing</TestimonialHighlight>! It has completely transformed how I work.
        </TestimonialContent>
        <TestimonialDate>2 days ago</TestimonialDate>
      </TestimonialCard>

      <TestimonialCard>
        <TestimonialHeader>
          <TestimonialAvatar src="/faces/2.jpg" alt="Jane Smith" />
          <TestimonialInfo>
            <Name>Jane Smith</Name>
            <Username>@janesmith</Username>
          </TestimonialInfo>
        </TestimonialHeader>
        <TestimonialStars />
        <TestimonialContent>
          The attention to <TestimonialHighlight>detail</TestimonialHighlight> is incredible. Highly recommended!
        </TestimonialContent>
        <TestimonialDate>1 week ago</TestimonialDate>
      </TestimonialCard>

      <TestimonialCard>
        <TestimonialHeader>
          <TestimonialAvatar src="/faces/3.jpg" alt="Mike Johnson" />
          <TestimonialInfo>
            <Name>Mike Johnson</Name>
            <Username>@mikej</Username>
          </TestimonialInfo>
        </TestimonialHeader>
        <TestimonialStars />
        <TestimonialContent>
          <TestimonialHighlight>Outstanding</TestimonialHighlight> customer service and product quality.
        </TestimonialContent>
        <TestimonialDate>2 weeks ago</TestimonialDate>
      </TestimonialCard>
    </TestimonialCarousel>
  )
}
